message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $12000?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I'm willing to consider your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11500. Would you be open to that?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $11000?

I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $11000, but I'll throw in a special bonus that's not included in the price. Would you be willing to meet me at $11500?
I appreciate the bonus, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Would you be willing to meet me at $11000 and throw in the bonus as well?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product. I'll throw in the bonus and meet you at $11000, but I'll also throw in a second bonus that's not included in the price. Would you be willing to meet me at $11250?
I'm really close to accepting, Alice, but I still need to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $11000 and throw in both bonuses?

I can see you're really close to making a decision, Bob! I'll throw in both bonuses and meet you at $11000, but I'll also include a 1-year warranty on the product. Would you be willing to meet me at $11200?
